title: Conditioning on PDE Parameters to Generalise Deep Learning Emulation of Stochastic and Chaotic Dynamics
summary: This paper presents a deep learning emulator for stochastic and chaotic spatio-temporal systems, explicitly conditioned on the parameter values of the underlying partial differential equations (PDEs). The approach involves pre-training and fine-tuning to generalize across a broad range of parameter values.
usefulness_reason: The title and summary directly address "stochastic and chaotic spatio-temporal systems", which is a core aspect of the 'Spatio Temporal' topic.
